Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local CAS, UIS = game:GetService'ContextActionService', game:GetService'UserInputService'
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() script.Parent.Input:FireServer('Mouse1', true, mouse.Hit) end) mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) script.Parent.Input:FireServer('Key', true, key) end)
if UIS.TouchEnabled then CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( 'Finnster_DualWield', function(name, state, input) if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then script.Parent.Input:FireServer('Key', true, 'q') end end, true, '' ) CAS:SetTitle('Finnster_DualWield', 'Dual Wield') end end)
script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(function(mouse) if UIS.TouchEnabled then CAS:UnbindAction('Finnster_DualWield') end end)

--[[ Fixed by ArceusInator - Mac users can now see the mesh - The gear works in FE games --]]
Tool = script.Parent Pistol = Tool.Handle
local pistolClone local newWeld local dualActive local dualWalk local vCharacter
local bulletSound
Tool.Enabled = true
local damage = 10 local bulletClone
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
bullet = Instance.new("Part") bullet.Size = Vector3.new(0.3, 0.3, 0.3) bullet.Transparency = 0.3 bullet.Shape = "Ball" bullet.FormFactor = 3 bullet.Name ="HC" bullet.CanCollide = false
local bulletMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bulletMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" bulletMesh.Name = "Mesh" bulletMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" bulletMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49040283" bulletMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.003, 0.003, 0.003) bulletMesh.Parent = bullet
local newBF = Instance.new("BodyForce") newBF.Name = "BF"
function blow(bullet, hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) bullet:Remove() if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) if hit.Name == "Head" then damage = 35 end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) damage = 10 wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag:Remove() end end end
function shoot(direction) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then print("Torso NO") return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.Head.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + direction.unit * 5.0
bulletClone = bullet:Clone() bulletClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) bulletClone.Parent = game.Workspace bulletClone.Velocity = direction * 50.0
bulletFloat = newBF:Clone() bulletFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, 196.1 * bulletClone:GetMass(), 0.0) bulletFloat.Parent = bulletClone
bulletClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit.Parent then blow(bulletClone, hit) end end)
debris:addItem(bulletClone, 4) end
function onActivatedL(hit) if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then print("Torso not found") return end
bulletSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("BulletSound")
local target = hit.p local direction = (target - vCharacter.Head.Position).unit dualActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("DualActive") if dualActive.Value == 0 then shoot(direction) if bulletSound then bulletSound:Play() end wait(0.2) else shoot(direction) if bulletSound then bulletSound:Play() end wait(0.1) shoot(direction) if bulletSound then bulletSound:Play() end end wait(0.3) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onKeyDown(key) dualActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("DualActive") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if key:lower() == "q" and dualActive.Value == 0 then if myTorso then pistolClone = Pistol:Clone() pistolClone.Parent = vCharacter pistolClone.Name = "Pistol" newWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") newWeld.Parent = leftArm newWeld.Name = "LeftGrip" newWeld.Part0 = leftArm newWeld.Part1 = pistolClone newWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0.0, -1.45, 0.0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0.0, 0.0) dualActive.Value = 1 if myHumanoid then if dualWalk == nil then dualWalk = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.DualWalk) end dualWalk:Play() end end elseif key:lower()=="q" and dualActive.Value == 1 then if myTorso then leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") leftGrip = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") if leftGrip then leftGrip:Remove() end pistol = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Pistol") if pistol then pistol:Remove() end dualActive.Value = 0 if dualWalk then dualWalk:Stop() end end end end
function onEquippedL() vCharacter = Tool.Parent end
function onUnequippedL() dualActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("DualActive") if dualActive then dualActive.Value = 0 end if dualWalk then dualWalk:Stop() end leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") leftGrip = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Grip") if leftGrip then leftGrip:Remove() end pistol = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Pistol") if pistol then pistol:Remove() end
if bulletSound then bulletSound:Stop() end end
--Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedL) Tool.Input.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client, action, ...) if client.Character == Tool.Parent then if action == 'Mouse1' then local down, hit = ...
if down then onActivatedL(hit) end elseif action == 'Key' then local down, key = ...
if down then onKeyDown(key) end end end end) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedL) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedL)
